content.rendered:
Body

Structural adipose tissue provides a wide range of natural options for breast and body procedures, all in a ready-to-use, non-surgical product.

Breast

Choose the implant with a 20-year warranty. Sientra implants have an unrivaled safety profile and full range of sizes, all with the balanced strength and softness of our High Strength Cohesive Gel for a beautiful, natural look that fits you.

Enhanced Viability Fat Transfer with Viality can help elevate your breast augmentation outcomes using your body’s fat to create a lasting natural shape.

Face

Bellafill is the longest lasting, FDA-approved, dermal filler on the market.1 Collagen gel provides an immediate, natural correction while the microsphere technology stimulates your own collagen creation for an elegant, refreshed looking you.

Silhouette InstaLift is a unique minimally-invasive facial procedure that offers both an immediate lift and a gradual boost in collagen production for long-lasting results.

REFERENCES:
  1. Bellafill® [US Instructions for Use]. San Diego, CA: Suneva Medical, Inc.; 2023.

Harness the power of regenerative aesthetics.

Find a Provider
